img_above_text:
Worryfree Bree can be found at The Webbed Hollow's The Verdure Bridge Shrine location. From the Shrine, continue deeper into the area, until you cross a small bridge just to the left of the Shrine. Drop down from this bridge and continue through the lower cave systems (following the flames).
Head up the stairs on the left after a short while and follow the flames to the top of the hill.
img_below_text:
On your right, you will cross a small walkway to find some Spider Cocoons blocking a doorway. Destroy them to find the Drink inside.
![Wukong MiddleHollow 21.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/9d/Wukong_MiddleHollow_21.jpg)

Head up the stairs on the left after a short while and follow the flames to the top of the hill."
        - Following Text: "On your right, you will cross a small walkway to find some Spider Cocoons blocking a doorway. Destroy them to find the Drink inside.

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from *Black Myth: Wukong*, showing the player character standing in a dark, web-covered area near a wooden building illuminated by a lantern. The character wields a fiery staff, and the environment is filled with eerie details like spider webs and dim lighting. A red arrow indicates the path forward, leading up a staircase to continue the journey, as described in the preceding text. This area is part of the exploration through The Webbed Hollow, following flames to progress toward the next objective.
